mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_main_image, count(r.review_no) review_num, round(avg(r.review_rating), 1) review_rating from product p left outer join product_ordertest po on p.product_no = po.product_no left outer join reviewtest r on po.order_no = r.order_no and po.user_no = r.user_no group by p.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_main_image
